statements: SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_gateway, transaction_amount FROM payments;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT payment_gateway, card_number FROM payments WHERE card_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, card_number, transaction_amount FROM payments ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_gateway, transaction_amount FROM payments WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456';
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, card_expiry_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_gateway, card_expiry_date FROM payments WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND payment_gateway = 'PayPal';
SELECT payment_id, transaction_amount FROM payments WHERE card_expiry_date > '2023-01-01' AND payment_gateway <> 'CreditCard' ORDER BY payment_id;
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM payments;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT id, amount, currency FROM payments WHERE currency = 'EUR';
SELECT card_number, expiration_date, cvv FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, currency FROM payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments;
SELECT id, amount, currency FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE currency = 'USD' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT payment_id, status, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE status = 'success' AND gateway_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT payment_id, status, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE status = 'pending' AND gateway_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status IN ('success', 'pending') ORDER BY status, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_url FROM payment_gateways WHERE id = 'fb8f2e69-91b4-4a77-b098-9353a25e13f8';
SELECT transaction_id, card_holder_name, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE gateway_id = 'fb8f2e69-91b4-4a77-b098-9353a25e13f8' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways;
SELECT gateway_name, gateway_url FROM payment_gateways ORDER BY gateway_name DESC;
SELECT gateway_name, COUNT(*) FROM payment_gateways GROUP BY gateway_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.card_holder_name, t.transaction_amount, g.gateway_name FROM credit_card_transactions t JOIN payment_gateways g ON t.gateway_id = g.id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT l.log_id, t.card_holder_name, l.log_message, l.log_timestamp FROM transaction_logs l JOIN credit_card_transactions t ON l.transaction_id = t.transaction_id ORDER BY l.log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, card_number FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status='approved';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT gateway_name, api_key FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status='completed' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT gateway_name, api_key, endpoint_url FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_status FROM transactions t JOIN payment_history ph ON t.transaction_id = ph.transaction_id WHERE ph.payment_status = 'Successful';

SELECT c.customer_name, t.amount, ph.payment_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.transaction_id JOIN payment_history ph ON t.transaction_id = ph.transaction_id ORDER BY ph.payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, amount, status FROM payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, card_number FROM customers INNER JOIN cards ON customers.customer_id = cards.customer_id WHERE cards.is_default = true;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, customer_id, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_id = 1;
SELECT gateway_name, integration_key FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT payment_id, amount, status FROM payments WHERE transaction_id = 4 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000;
